meanings.definition: Essential nutrients required by the body in small amounts for proper functioning.
meanings.sent1: Micronutrients are like tiny helpers that keep our bodies working well.
meanings.sent2: Our diet should include a variety of foods rich in micronutrients to stay healthy.
meanings.sent3: I heard a joke that only micronutrients can understand - they're so small, after all!
meanings.sent4: Just as small screws hold a machine together, micronutrients keep our bodies in balance.
meanings.sent5: Imagine micronutrients as the little puzzle pieces that complete the picture of our health.

meanings.definition: Nutrients such as vitamins and minerals that are necessary for growth and development.
meanings.sent1: Kids need plenty of micronutrients to grow up strong and healthy.
meanings.sent2: Fruits and vegetables are great sources of essential micronutrients.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled a jar of micronutrients in the garden - now the plants are growing extra fast!
meanings.sent4: In a way, micronutrients act like the building blocks for our bodies' growth.
meanings.sent5: The role of micronutrients in our diet is as crucial as the bricks in a sturdy house.
